attributes.action: We the undersigned petition ask that the prime minister, Reduces the age to drive a moped to 15, change the speed limit to 40mph and abolish road tax.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We need to follow other european countries. We should be able to drive a moped at 15 and not at the mad speed of 30mph. ALl bikes under 125cc should not pay road tax. and road tax prices should be de-creased for bikes and increased for trucks as they pollute and give us bikers fumes
attributes.creator_name: John A smith should be banned
